Pre-Game Insights: Victor Wembanyama is ruled out for the game against the Dallas Mavericks due to a leg injury.
Wembanyama has faced the Dallas Mavericks four times in his career, averaging 17.5 points, 8.5 rebounds, 2.8 assists, 1.0 steals, and 2.8 blocks per game.
In a previous matchup this season, Wembanyama struggled with his shooting, going 5 of 18 from the field, but still contributed with 17 points, nine rebounds, one assist, and one block.
